file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-11-02-04 - OBSERVER SEAT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL OBSERVER SEAT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the observer seat. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 25-11-02-000-801-A OBSERVER SEAT - REMOVAL ALL 25-11-02-400-801-A OBSERVER SEAT - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-11-02 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-11-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. OBSERVER SEAT - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the observer seat assembly. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit H. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Make sure that the observer seat assembly (1) is in the stowed position. Refer to DET. A. (2) Remove the nut (9) and washer (8) that attach the pivot (6) to the pivot pin (7). Refer to DET. C. (3) Lift up the retainer (10). Refer to DET. D. (4) Remove the observer seat assembly (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-11-02 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Observer Seat Assembly - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A D 1. OBSERVER ZONE SEAT ASSY 224 (STOWED POSITION) COPILOT SEAT (REF.) B BACK CUSHION ASSY (REF.) BOTTOM CUSHION ASSY (REF) 10. RETAINER C 2. STRAP ASSY DET. A 3. LOCKING SCREW 1 DET. B DET. D 5. INTERNAL 4. EXTERNAL BUCKLE HALF 6. PIVOT BUCKLE HALF BOTTOM CUSHION 2. STRAP ASSY ASSY (REF.) 8. WASHER BACK CUSHION 9. NUT ASSY (REF.) 3 7. PIVOT PIN DET. C 1 PRE-MOD S.B. 145-25-0109 2 POST-MOD S.B. 145-25-0109 2 3 TORQUE: 13.6 N.m (120.4 lb. in) 145AMM250132.MCE B 145AMM250132.MCE B EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-11-02 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-11-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. OBSERVER SEAT - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to install the observer seat assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION S.B.145-25-0109 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Torque Wrench To apply controlled torque available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A NOTE: • On aircraft PRE-MOD. S.B.145-25-0109, make sure that the bottom and back cushion assemblies are attached by the strap assembly (2) and the locking screw (3). Refer to DET. B, Figure 401. • On aircraft POST-MOD. S.B.145-25-0109, make sure that the bottom and back cushion assemblies are attached by the internal and external buckle halves (4) and (5). Refer to DET. B, Figure 401. (1) Put the observer seat assembly (1) in its stowed position to install the pivot (6) on the pivot pin (7). Refer to DET. A and DET. C. (2) Install the nut (9) and washer (8) to tighten the pivot (6) to the pivot pin (7). Refer to DET. C. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-11-02 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Torque the nut (9). Refer to DET. D, Figure 401. (4) Push the retainer (10) down. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-11-02 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
